Armored Vehicle
Previous Next
Vehicles

The F2-TLC600 armored vehicle provides certified ballistic and blast protection, ride and handling and braking with production level interior fit and finish. The protective cell is installed using a unique modular bolt in construction system which aids in repair and serviceability. All of the armoured steel parts are corrosion protected by cataphoretic paint. The vehicle is certified by the ballistics test station at Mellrichstadt. Ride/handling and braking have been tested at maximum GVW by TÜV Hannover.

Relief Items

Blankets are used to provide insulation / protection against loss of body temperature, according to the requirements imposed by climate / temperature conditions. Blankets are typically used for emergencies. This blanket is naturally flame retardant and offers great thermal properties that will provide comfort and warmth to individuals.

Generator
Previous Next
Energy

Generators supply continuous electrical power (at variable load) in lieu of commercially purchased power. There is no limitation to the annual hours of operation and the models provided by UNHRD can supply 10% overload power for 1 hour in 12 hours.

Pre-Fab Soft Wall – MSUs
Previous Next

US$ 12,175.61 (Average)

Shelter

MSUs are designed to be easily assembled / disassembled and to store both Food and Non-food-Items in an emergency environment. MSU designs resemble a traditional tent shape made from lightweight, easy to assemble steel tubing’s, covered with a durable, UV stabilized, PVC-coated polyester fabric. The standard fabric colour is white and translucent to allow for good daylight transmission. However other color options are available on demand. The length of this hall can be increased or decreased based on multiple 4 meter modules. Each gable end has a large hooded air vent built-in to improve air circulation. Two large folding load/unloading doors are positioned, one in each gable end.

Pre-Fab Hard wall (office-living)
Previous Next

US$ 8,433.54 (Average)

Shelter

Pre fabs are easily erected buildings, operational in a very short time, and can be assembled completely by hand, without need for any kind of heavy mechanical equipment. Construction time for the Single Module Building will not exceed twenty-five minutes with a skilled team of four workers. - Purpose of the office accommodation: Flexible and adaptable for use as office, living, conference rooms, medical examination room. - Operating Conditions: The environment in which the MSUs will be working in is very diverse with extreme weather conditions from very cold with ice/snow and on the opposite end of the spectrum very hot and humid.

Plastic Paller
Previous Next

US$26.80

Storage

The pallet is suited for diverse and flexible use throughout the entire logistics sector. The plastic pallets are injection-moulded in one piece, made with regenerated HDPE (high density polyethylene). Their conical bases interlock, reducing storage and transportation costs. All pallets are designed and tested for hygienic compliance and are compatible with all standard handling and conveying systems.

Tarpaulins are large sheets of strong, flexible, water-resistant or waterproof material. In some Tarpaulins have reinforced grommets at the corners and along the sides to form attachment points for rope, allowing them to be tied down or suspended.

Water Bladder
Previous Next

US$1,177.35 (Average)

WASH

Water bladders, also known as bladder tanks, are designed for transport purposes on flatbed truck. Complete with ground cover, bladder tank and harness. Tanks are made from PVC – coated polyester fabric manufactured in consideration of high UV-intensity in many users’ areas. The PVC - coating is non-toxic and approved by official bodies for use in transport and storage of drinking water

WASH

Safe drinking water is a crucial element when responding to humanitarian crises arising from natural or man-made disasters. The Water Purifier is a handy device that removes bacterias and viruses from unclean water.

First Flight Kit
Previous Next

US$ 12,175.61 (Average)

Staff Safety and Travel

The First Flight Accommodation Kit is a ready to deploy base camp for 12 people that includes the most beneficial supplies, equipment, and camp layout to aid first responders. This solution provides emergency responders with a standardized kit and method when being deployed, which allows the team to be completely self-sufficient in the field. The kit includes accommodation, office, and kitchen options, which includes necessary furniture, internal and external lighting, fencing, power distribution, accessories and spare parts.
